Contributor: Pilichowski, L., artist.; Hill Siffken, publisher.;
Note: Signed "L. Pilichowski." Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that the wounded allies days are Tuesday and Wednesday June 6th and 7th and that there is a Wounded Allies Relief Committee. Illustration shows a man and two women holding some objects.  Also seen in the front of poster are various objects such as a musical instrument, bowls, jug, hat and shoe.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
